name: Brawl Quest
description:
Brawl Quest is a 2d fantasy action MMORPG

The game revolves around hacking hundreds of things to death on your own or with friends. We're currently in the early to mid part of development and have run one alpha event so far with another on the way in December.

Features

  • 2D retro graphics
  • Full multiplayer PvE and PvP
  • RPG mechanics with major/minor stats and gear progression
  • Completely free to play with NO microtransactions
  • Repeatable grind-able content
  • (Fairly) large open world with deep lore
  • 41 different encounters
  • 10 levels
  • 2 raids
  • 5 dungeons
  • Lots of spells
  • Lots of gear

When can we play?

The next Alpha event will be running from December 31st to January 31st.

Check out the website for more info!
